body_html: Do you ever clear your window variable? Otherwise it will accumulate history every time you call forward and when you call backward it will back over the entire history of training, not just the last time you called forward. If you need the information in window from one iteration to the next you can simply re-wrap it in a variable. I'm also wondering why you put window in a list of tensors instead of adding another dim to window.
